programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Que Assim Seja, Trinity, (1974, Western)
programme.desc: Um aventureiro protege um garoto que herdou um terreno sob o qual há um rico campo de petróleo. O menino é ameaçado por vilões perigosos que querem prejudicá-lo e tomar a terra.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Joe, o Pistoleiro Implacável, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: O bando do impiedoso Duncan massacra uma tribo de índios Navajo inclusive mulheres e crianças apenas para conseguir e depois vender escalpos.

programme.title: O Último Pôr do Sol, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Belle Breckenridge e John Becheridge estão se preparando para uma jornada com o gado até o Texas, até que chega a casa deles o caubói Brendan O'Malley.

programme.title: O Céu Mandou Alguém, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: Após mais um assalto, três ladrões de banco fogem rumo ao deserto. Perseguidos pelo xerife Buck Sweet, eles encontram uma mulher no meio do nada.

programme.title: Indômita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: O Passado Não Perdoa, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A família Zachary é uma família rica e influente do Texas, comandada por Ben e sua mãe, além dos outros três filhos, dois meninos e Rachel, que é adotada.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: A Batalha de Shindisi, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em eventos reais que ocorreram durante a intervenção militar russa na Geórgia em 2008.

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após os humanos esgotarem todas as fontes de água na Terra, uma nave é enviada até Titã, a maior Lua de Saturno, com a missão de reabastecer o nosso planeta.

programme.title: Original Gangster, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Conheça a diferente vida de Castor: órfão quando criança, forçado a sobreviver no deserto, até crescer e chegar a Londres, onde se tornou um dos principais chefões do submundo do crime.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma família distante de uma montanha durante a erupção de um vulcão e lutar contra uma horda de zumbis cheios de lava trazidos à vida por uma maldição.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: Circus Kane - O Circo dos Horrores, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo é convidado para um misterioso jogo em uma casa de horrores, sob a promessa de um prêmio de 250,000 dólares para aquele que sobreviver.

programme.title: Deep Web - Desejos Ocultos, (2020, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: DEEP WEB Desejos Ocultos conta a história de um hacker que é chantageado por um policial e, é obrigado a utilizar seus conhecimentos para viabilizar e vender lances de garotas sendo torturadas on line na quarta camada da DEEP WEB.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: Acreditando que ele seja seu inimigo, Sango procura Inuyasha em uma busca equivocada de vingança planejada por Narak, que quer Inuyasha morto.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e seus amigos param para enterrar os mortos, Sango revela a história secreta das origens da Jóia: a própria alma da sacerdotisa Midoriko.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Segredo da Jóia das Quatro Almas é Finalmente Revelado!

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos descobrem uma aldeia que sacrifica crianças ao deus local da água e conhece um menino chamado Taromaru que precisa de sua ajuda.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Lago da Escuridão Controlado pelo Deus da Água

programme.title: Depois que o túnel de vento de Mirok é atingido em uma luta com um youkai, Mirok retorna ao templo onde ele foi criado por Mushin, mas nem tudo está bem por lá.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome e Sango falam sobre seus respectivos passados, incluindo o irmão mais novo de Sango, Kohaku. Mas Narak tem planos sinistros para com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Angústia de Sango e a Vida de Kohaku

programme.title: Sango rouba a Tessaiga enquanto Inuyasha luta contra Kohaku e vai para o castelo de Narak. Ela pretende matá-lo, mas não será assim tão fácil.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Tessaiga Roubada e o Confronto no Castelo de Narak

programme.title: Sango e Kirara precisam de um antídoto para o veneno de Narak, então Inuyasha e Agome vão para uma vila onde eles encontram o gentil youkai Jinenji.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Jinenji: O Youkai Bondoso e Solitário

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos encontram uma caverna quando investigam youkais nas montanhas. Enquanto isso, Narak descobre que Kikyo ainda está viva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Inuyasha Varridos pelo Miasma

programme.title: Inuyasha e seus amigos partem para salvar Kikyo, mas são vulneráveis a ataques de youkais. Apenas Agome está imune, graças à Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru está insatisfeito com a espada Tenseiga, e ele exige que o ferreiro Totosai lhe faça outra. Totosai chama o Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Sesshomaru continuam sua batalha, fazendo pleno uso de suas respectivas heranças. Após a luta, Sesshomaru encontra a órfão Rin.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Celebre Espada Escolhe seu Verdadeiro Mestre!

programme.title: Kuga, o líder da tribo de youkais lobos orientais, desafia Inuyasha para uma luta depois de usar os fragmentos da Jóia como acessórios.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Sequestro de Agome! Kuga, O Youkai Lobo Super Veloz!

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros estão a caminho para resgatar Agome e Shippo. Agome concorda em ajudar Kuga sob a condição de que Shippo não seja ferido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Youkai que se Apaixonou por Agome

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de outra discussão com Inuyasha. De volta à escola, ela se depara com mais problemas de relacionamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Separados, Os Dois se dão Conta de Seus Sentimentos

programme.title: Os insetos de Narak roubam um fragmento de Jóia da testa de um youkai urso. A cria de Narak, Kagura, usa um fragmento para controlar a tribo do lobo e Kuga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Um Plano Ardiloso! Uma Luta de Vida ou Morte!

programme.title: A batalha de Inuyasha contra Kuga continua até que a própria Kagura apareça. A cria de Narak domina os ventos na batalha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Armadilha de Kagura: A Mestra do Vento!

programme.title: Mirok se reúne com Koharu, uma garota que fugiu de sua aldeia depois que eles se conheceram. Então a irmã mais velha de Kagura, Kanna, usa Koharu para atacar Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Dança de Kagura e Espelho de Kanna

programme.title: Inuyasha continua lutando contra Kagura. O espelho de Kanna revela recursos inesperados quando Inuyasha usa a Ferida do Vento contra ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha exige saber por que Kikyo deu os fragmentos da Jóia que ela roubou de Agome para Narak, que libera um youkai com chifres.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru leva as presas do falecido Goshinki ao renegado aprendiz de Totosai, Kaijinbo, para fazer uma nova espada, enquanto Totosai repara Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A batalha de Kaijinbo com Inuyasha, empunhando a espada Tokijin, termina em destruição, e Kagura sente uma abertura para Sesshomaru destruir seu irmão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kuga quer se vingar de Narak pela morte de seus membros da tribo. Quando o mais novo lacaio de Narak, Juromaru, o desafia, ele tem sua chance.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome retorna ao presente depois de uma briga com Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Narak planeja se livrar dos sentimentos de Onigumo por Kikyo dentro dele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Coração de Onigumo Ainda Vive em Narak

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Sango encontra os corpos de seu pai e os outros exterminadores nas ruínas do castelo de Narak. Seu irmão Kohaku ainda vive, mas ele perdeu a memória.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O irmão de Sango, Kohaku, foi possuído por Narak e está tentando matar Agome. Enquanto isso, Inuyasha e Mirok continuam lutando contra Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Rosto que Não Sai do Meu Coração

programme.title: Sesshomaru visita o youkai da árvore Bokusen-Oh buscando os segredos da transformação de Inuyasha. Enquanto isso, Sango se preocupa com um Kohaku inconsciente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha se transforma em um youkai quando sua vida corre perigo. Ele rapidamente acaba com Gatenmaru, que se transformou. Ele ataca os bandidos que estão escapando com suas garras, e ele não pode ouvir Agome tentando pará-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Verdadeira Natureza do Youkai Não Pode ser Reprimida

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai com a Tessaiga quebrada. Sua própria presa é usada para consertá-la.

programme.title: Ryukotsusei tira a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e ele se transforma em um youkai. Totosai diz a todos para recuar porque estão em perigo, mas Agome decide ficar para trás.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Onda Explosiva! O Ataque Supremo da Tessaiga

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmão, que foi à guerra, voltará. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmão lhe deu, um fragmento de Jóia. Infelizmente, é apenas uma flor feita de pedra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff nota que seus sapatos aumentaram de tamanho subitamente após tentar perseguir um homem que o seguia.

programme.title: Hol Horse age de acordo com a profecia do livro, mas começa a questionar tudo quando Jotaro e o resto do grupo aparecem.

programme.title: Mesmo estranhando as atitudes de Jotaro, D'Arby se mantém confiante graças ao Stand. Avdol e os outros entram na mansão.

programme.title: Josuke e Koichi decidem encontrar o arco e flecha e destruí-lo para impedir que haja mais vítimas. Eles o encontram no sótão, mas escutam um som estranho.

programme.title: As Crônicas de Spiderwick, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Esta aventura de fantasia é adaptada da série de livros campeã de vendas, que revela um mundo nunca visto que existe ao nosso redor.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Segredos, (2020, Action)

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caçador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresário em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Olhos de Dragão, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Hong usa sua visão moral e habilidades para lutar e salvar um bairro de traficantes de drogas e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: Jet Li é Wong Fei-Hong, herói chinês que vai à América, é salvo por índios e luta contra a exploração de trabalhadores chineses por um tirano local.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)

programme.title: The Barefoot Contessa, (1954, Romance)
programme.desc: A waning director revives his career after discovering a beautiful Spanish dancer and makes her into a Hollywood star. Ava Gardner, Humphrey Bogart and Edmond O’Brien star in this bitter tale of stardom won and wasted from Joseph L. Mankiewicz.

programme.title: The Apartment, (1960, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon, Shirley MacLaine and Fred MacMurray are superb in this tale of love and ambition in the world of big business that went on to garner a Best Picture Oscar.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard, (1950, Drama)
programme.desc: Intense, enthralling, and unforgettable, Sunset Boulevard stars Gloria Swanson as Norma Desmond, a faded silent-movie star, and William Holden as Joe Gillis, a down-on-his-luck screenwriter whom she enlists to help her make her triumphant return.

programme.title: Irma La Douce, (1963, Screwball)
programme.desc: Set in Paris' famous Red Light district, a rookie policeman (Jack Lemmon) plots to keep a beautiful prostitute (Shirley MacLaine) all to himself in this hit comedy from director Billy Wilder.

programme.title: The Skull, (1965, Thriller)
programme.desc: The skull of the Marquis de Sade has been taken from its grave, bringing terror to those who own it. Demonologist Christopher Maitland is eager to add the piece to his occult collection.

programme.title: The Beast With A Million Eyes, (1955, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An unspeakable horror! Extraterrestrial terror is on the hunt for human flesh in this horrifying tale of invasion! This is a 1950s creature-feature with some serious sociological bite! Paul Birch, Lorna Thayer, and Richard Sargent star!

programme.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space, (1959, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Aliens from outer space reanimate the Earth's dead in an attempt to save the human race. Ed Wood's cult classic - Restored and In Color!

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Action)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Kandahar, (2023, Action)

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Quarantine, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: When a news crew decides to trail a brave fire-fighting team, they never suspect that the first call for help they respond to that night may be their last. Now they're trapped in an apartment complex sealed off by the government. Rating: R

programme.title: Quarantine 2: Terminal, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Earlier tonight, a bizarre disease was unleashed in a run-down Los Angeles tenement... and no one got out alive. Yet something escaped. Now, aboard Flight 318, the first symptoms begin to show. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill, (2005, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling horror action game, Silent Hill stars Radha Mitchell (Man on Fire) as Rose, a desperate mother who takes her adopted daughter, Sharon, to the town of Silent Hill in an attempt to cure her of her ailment. Rating: R

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: On the eve of her 18th birthday, plagued by terrifying nightmares and her father's disappearance, Heather discovers she is not who she thinks she is. The revelation leads her deep into a demonic world that threatens to trap her in Silent Hill forever.

programme.title: Vacancy, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: A suspenseful, classic thriller, in the tradition of Alfred Hitchcock, starring Luke Wilson and Kate Beckinsale, that will keep you on the edge of your seat and your heart pounding! Rated: R

programme.title: Vivarium, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple’s search for a dream home plunges them into a terrifying nightmare after they are trapped in a mysterious, labyrinth-like neighborhood of identical houses.

programme.title: Pandorum, (2009, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft without knowing who they are, how long they've been asleep, or their mission. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Mid-Century, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award Nominee Bruce Dern and Stephen Lang star in this horror tale about a couple renting a vacation home who meet the spirits of the architect and his two wives—plus their deranged, living son.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Ascendant One
programme.desc: Deep within a volcano’s molten lava, Kars contemplates a comeback. But with the Red Stone’s power unleashed, both warriors are launched into the stratosphere of the unknown.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The members of the Phantom Troupe go to Zazan's nest to defeat her. The Troupe splits up to confront Zazan's minions individually. As they battle, each member of the Troupe reveals their secret ability.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: A pair of Chimera Ants appears and hunts Gon under the cover of night, overwhelming him with their attacks. Feeling that things are at a standstill, he gathers up his Nen and prepares to throw a punch.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knuckle and Shoot are lying in wait for Cheetu. But just as Cheetu is about to approach them, he suddenly changes direction and disappears. Meanwhile, Killua and Gon sense that someone is following them again.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov infiltrates the palace. His goal is to place the exits for his ability, the Fourth Dimensional Mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Morel has been chased into an underground church by the lion-type Chimera Ant, Leol.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua have gained new allies and prepare to charge into battle.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company .

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
programme.desc: Japan, 1987. Jotaro Kujo, a descendant of the Joestar family, is in prison and claims he is being possessed by an evil spirit. His grandfather, Joseph Joestar, immediately departs for Japan, where he must reveal the family's terrible secret.
programme.sub-title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Who Will Be the Judge!?
programme.desc: Jotaro returns to his normal life while keeping his "Stand" power a secret. But on the way to school one day he meets a new transfer student named Noriaki Kakyoin and sustains a strange injury.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Curse of DIO
programme.desc: Jotaro defeats Kakyoin with his Stand power, but as he attempts to glean information from his adversary about DIO, Joseph notices a sinister connection.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Tower of Grey
programme.desc: The Joestars must defeat DIO within 50 days or Holly's life is forfeit. With no time to lose, they head for Egypt where DIO is thought to be hiding but end up encountering a new threat along the way.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Silver Chariot
programme.desc: Jotaro and his comrades are attacked by Polnareff, an assassin with a Stand called "Silver Chariot" that is capable of lightning-fast swordplay. It falls to Avdol to face down the threat using "Magician's Red."

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Dark Blue Moon
programme.desc: Jotaro welcomes a new member to the team and the group leaves for Singapore by ship. Along the way, a young stowaway is found and Jotaro comes under attack, but is the child the source of this latest evil?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Strength
programme.desc: Jotaro’s group is rescued when they spot a giant cargo ship, but they soon find that the only occupant is a strange orangutan. Curious, they begin to explore the ship and solve its mysteries.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Jotaro and his companions finally make it to a hotel in Singapore, but soon Polnareff falls into a trap set by a dangerous and brutal enemy.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yellow Temperance
programme.desc: Joseph uses his Stand to generate a spirit message from a TV, only to receive a warning claiming that Kakyoin is a traitor. Meanwhile, Jotaro, Ann and Kakyoin are out exploring Singapore when Kakyoin begins acting strangely.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: The Joestars' group arrives in India, where Polnareff is attacked by a Stand only visible through a mirror. As terrifying as it is, the Stand could also be related to his sister's murder.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2
programme.desc: When Avdol is struck down defending Polnareff, the Frenchman goes into a state of shock, leaving him vulnerable. That is when "Hanged Man," Centerfold's Stand, begins its most furious attack.
programme.sub-title: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Empress
programme.desc: Jotaro and the others next head toward Varanasi. On their way there, Joseph realizes his arm is quite swollen. At first, it doesn't bother him much, but the bigger it gets, the creepier it looks.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Jotaro and his group head toward Pakistan by car. Polnareff is behind the wheel on a dangerous mountain road when a mysterious vehicle starts impeding their progress.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Justice Part 1
programme.desc: After surviving another attack, Jotaro and his team make it to Pakistan, where they stop at an inn to rest. The village around the inn, however, is quiet, and its inhabitants rather odd.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Justice Part 2
programme.desc: Polnareff realizes that Enyaba is a new assassin sent by DIO. He is prevented from warning his comrades by Enyaba's Stand "Justice," which has the ability to control corpses.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Lovers Part 1
programme.desc: After surviving Enyaba's attack, Jotaro and crew make it to Pakistan's capital, Karachi. There, they encounter DIO's next assassin, Dan of Steel.

programme.title: City Hunter, (1993, Action Comedies)

programme.title: Bloodsport, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Ninjitsu master Frank Dux journeys to Hong Kong to enter the Kumite, the Olympics of martial arts, and meets a beautiful American reporter. Before long he must face Chong-Li, a vicious Korean master of Tae Kwan Do, in a climactic fight to the finish.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Kickboxer, (1989, Action)
programme.desc: When kickboxing champ Eric Sloane is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt, seeks vengeance.

programme.title: Lionheart, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme is Lyon Gaultier, a deserter in the French Foreign Legion who travels to the USA and enters the gory world of bare-knuckled street fighting in order to make money to save his brother's life and family.

programme.title: Death Warrant, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Action superstar Jean-Claude van Damme ("Bloodsport", "Cyborg") is a veteran undercover cop posing as an inmate in a dangerously corrupt state prison.

programme.title: Double Impact, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Knock Off, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Hickey, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: Nerdy but lovable, Ryan has less than a day to save the store he hates, if he's to have any chance at winning the heart of the girl he loves.

programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: Two Can Play That Game, (2001, African-American Romance)
programme.desc: A sassy, confident woman must use all her wiles to have any hope of bringing her man back . . . while keeping her pride intact.

programme.title: Friends with Benefits, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A young man and woman decide to take their friendship to the next level without becoming a couple, but soon discover that adding sex only leads to complications.

programme.title: No Strings Attached, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A hilarious story about Emma and Adam who set up a seemingly perfect arrangement with each other based soley on sex and having only one cardinal rule: No Strings Attached.

programme.title: 2 Days In New York, (2012, Indie Romance)
programme.desc: A visit from relatives overseas disrupts a New York couple's home life and initiates two unforgettable days of family mayhem.

programme.title: Almost Famous, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: 1994 Oscar Winner: Best Cinematography. Based on the novella by Jim Harrison, this sweeping romantic epic is about the Ludlow brothers--two men (Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn) in love with the same woman (Julia Ormond). Rated: R

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Adapted from William Shakespeare, the film tells the story of two couples, confirmed bachelor Benedick and caustic Beatrice, and young Claudio and innocent Hero. Playful bickering defines one couple, whereas romance and betrayal describe the other.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Out of Time, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in this spell-binding thriller as the Chief of Police of a small town who finds himself caught in the eye of a storm as he investigates the murder of a woman he was secretly seeing….because all the evidence points to him!

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Adventure)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Roman Polanski directs and Johnny Depp stars in this supernatural thriller about a rare-book dealer who discovers a demonic manuscript.

programme.title: Terminal, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a waitress leading a dangerous double life.

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: A young surfer, Nick, falls madly in love with a beautiful girl. It all seems perfect until he meets her uncle, the famous drug kingpin Pablo Escobar.

programme.title: Jennifer Eight, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: They are the unidentified victims of an unsolved death spree, women linked by a killer’s gruesome handiwork and by police files giving them the code name “Jennifer.”

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Limitless, (2011, Thriller)

programme.title: Freedom Writers, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this story about a teacher in a racially divided school who gives her students what they’ve always needed - a voice.

programme.title: The Man in the Iron Mask, (1998, Action)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: This mesmerizing and moving story follows the lives of a young couple living in suburban Connecticut who decide to risk everything to pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

programme.title: Ask the Dust, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: Arturo Bandini, a young would-be writer who comes to Depression-era Los Angeles to make a name for himself. While there, he meets beautiful barmaid Camilla, a Mexican immigrant who hopes for a better life by marrying a wealthy American.

programme.desc: This mesmerizing and moving story follows the lives of a young couple living in suburban Connecticut who decide to risk everything to pursue their dreams.

programme.title: Capote, (2005, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: In 1959, Truman Capote learns about the horrific and senseless murder of a family of four in Kansas. As he digs deeper into the story, he is inspired to expand the project into what would be his greatest work, In Cold Blood.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: The Hunting Party, (1971, Action)
programme.desc: To cattle baron Brandt Ruger (Gene Hackman), his stunning wife (Candice Bergen) is just one of his possessions. So when a notorious bandit kidnaps her, an enraged Ruger organizes a posse to recover his property dead or alive in the searing western!

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Musical)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: Timeline, (2003, Action)

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: The Boxtrolls, (2014, Fantasy)

programme.title: Annie, (2014, Musical)
programme.desc: A foster kid, who lives with her mean foster mom, sees her life change when business tycoon and New York mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

programme.title: Ghostbusters, (1984, Screwball)
programme.desc: A trio of university parasychologists lose their research grant and decide to open their own business, "Ghostbusters," and almost at once are summoned to investigate the strange happenings in a Central Park West apartment.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II, (1989, Screwball)
programme.desc: Directed by Ivan Reitman. Starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis, Annie Potts. The ghostbusters attempt to rid New York City from the slime and negative energy that plagues it.

programme.title: Drugstore June, (2024, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: After the pharmacy in her small town is robbed, a girl who still lives at home with her parents takes matters into her own hands to solve the crime, while at the same time trying to get over her ex-boyfriend and become more of an adult.

programme.title: Mr. Mom, (1983, Screwball)
programme.desc: Michael Keaton plays a husband and father who loses his job as an engineer at the auto manufacturing plant. After struggling to find another job, his wife lands a high-paying position at an advertising agency.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly star as two aimless middle-aged losers who are forced to become roommates after their parents get married.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Fantasy)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Earth Girls Are Easy, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three aliens (Jim Carrey, Damon Wayans, and Jeff Goldblum) crash-land in Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley. A manicurist (Geena Davis) and her boss (the wacky Julie Brown) befriend the threesome, give them makeovers and show them the town.

programme.title: Cutthroat Island, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

programme.title: Thelma & Louise, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: In one of the greatest road movies of all time, Geena Davis and Susan Sarandon ride to everlasting fame as two women who embark on a crime spree across the American southwest.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesar’s a guy who launders money for the mob. What’s the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Control, (2007, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Wanting to emulate his musical heroes, Ian Curtis joins a band, Joy Division. The singer's professional, personal, and romantic troubles slowly begin to eat away at him; leading him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

programme.title: City Of The Living Dead, (1980, Italian Horror)
programme.desc: The Seven Gates Of Hell have been torn open, and in three days the dead shall rise and walk the earth. As a reporter and a psychic race to close the portals of the damned, they encounter a seething nightmare of unspeakable evil.

programme.title: The Evil Dead, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: Five friends are holed up in a remote cabin, where they discover a Book Of The Dead. They unwittingly summon demons living in the nearby woods, which possess the youngsters in succession until only one is left intact to fight for survival.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: The Dark Half, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Stephen King's A Good Marriage, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: With a serial killer on the loose and a stranger stalking her family, a dedicated wife unveils a sinister secret about her husband that threatens their marriage, and their lives.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Horror)

programme.title: The Golden Child, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: As ‘The Chosen One’, Murphy’s on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who’s been abducted by an evil cult.

programme.title: Christine, (1983, Horror)
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Stephen King, CHRISTINE tells the story of a 1957 Plymouth that takes on human characteristics.

programme.title: Christine, (1983, Horror)

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime – even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: During the economic turmoil of 2008, Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), an enforcer, is hired to restore order after three idiots rob a mob-protected poker game.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Libby Parsons, who discovers that the husband she’s convicted of murdering staged his own “death” and framed her for the crime. Released on parole, she skips town to find him–and that puts parole officer Travis Lehman on her trail.

programme.title: No Country For Old Men, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Winner of four Academy Awards, including Best Picture, filmmakers Joel and Ethan Coen (FARGO) bring to the screen a thrilling bestseller in which a crime-scene's irresistible stolen loot sets forth an unstoppable chain reaction of violence.

programme.title: Hoodlum, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: 1930's New York. The black community of Harlem faces the same indignities as countless millions of refugees. If the seeds of Harlem's urban power would not grow in the White city, the Black underground would form to take control.

programme.title: The Bad News Bears, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: A major surprise as one of 1976's top-grossing films. THE BAD NEWS BEARS is a movie about children that is refreshing, utterly believable, and quite cleverly funny.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)
programme.desc: Steve McQueen, James Garner, and Richard Attenborough headline a stellar cast in one of the most ingenious and suspenseful adventure films of all time as a team of Allied soldiers mount a daring escape from an inescapable Nazi POW camp.

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The isolated inhabitants of an abandoned police station are under attack by the overwhelming numbers of a seemingly unstoppable street gang.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: A gang hijacks a subway train and threaten to kill the hostages one by one until their demands are met. Forced to stall, transit chief Lt. Garber (Walter Matthau) must outmaneuver one of the craftiest and cruelest screen villains (Robert Shaw) ever.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: Thief, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Michael Mann directs this stylishly photographed action-packed drama that stars James Caan as a master safe cracker who is planning his last heist for the sake of a woman (Tuesday Weld).

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Western)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned-revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: Kingpin, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Advertising executive Marcus Graham is a quintessential bachelor, Graham is never without a new lady on his arm. Enter Jacqueline, his new boss, and Marcus is on the receiving end of his own patented behavior for the first time!

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Out-of-control comedy features Jim Carrey at his hilarious best as a hard-wired cable installer just looking for a friend. Matthew Broderick co-stars.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13
